metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11867 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Audacity through 2.3.3 saves temporary files to /var/tmp/audacity-$USER by default. After Audacity creates the temporary directory, it sets its permissions to 755. Any user on the system can read and play the temporary audio .au files located there.

criterions.comment: audacity package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
